data.name: Video Reel at IMDb

data.name: Some funny stories when I had worked for the film business:
data.value: Some funny stories when I had worked for the film business:

data.name: One day I should install a computer in one building of the Babelsberg studios and had to walk to the server room.
data.value: One day I should install a computer in one building of the Babelsberg studios and had to walk to the server room.

data.name: While walking to the server room, someone from the custome department called me back.
data.value: While walking to the server room, someone from the custome department called me back.

data.name: I was wondering about it, but I was that kind and walked back to her.
data.value: I was wondering about it, but I was that kind and walked back to her.

data.name: Then she asked me if I do not want to change my clothes.
data.value: Then she asked me if I do not want to change my clothes.

data.name: I asked her what is wrong with my current clothes.
data.value: I asked her what is wrong with my current clothes.

data.name: We found out then that she had confused me with an actress or extra for the series, we had to laugh then and I continued my walk to the server room.
data.value: We found out then that she had confused me with an actress or extra for the series, we had to laugh then and I continued my walk to the server room.

data.name: At another day, I had again installed a computer in the same building of the Babelsberg studios, and when I left the building, two teenagers (maybe 11 or 12 years old) were waiting in front of the building.
data.value: At another day, I had again installed a computer in the same building of the Babelsberg studios, and when I left the building, two teenagers (maybe 11 or 12 years old) were waiting in front of the building.

data.name: They stared at me and so I looked back at them.
data.value: They stared at me and so I looked back at them.

data.name: Then they asked me if I would be a star and if I can give them an autograph.
data.value: Then they asked me if I would be a star and if I can give them an autograph.

data.name: It was the sweetest situation I have witnessed in my life so far.
data.value: It was the sweetest situation I have witnessed in my life so far.

data.name: I told them that I cannot give them an autograph and that I would only sign the papers of the parcel service (if they bring us new computers).
data.value: I told them that I cannot give them an autograph and that I would only sign the papers of the parcel service (if they bring us new computers).

data.name: I then explained them that I am not a star and that they will have to continue to wait.
data.value: I then explained them that I am not a star and that they will have to continue to wait.

data.name: Unfortunately, I could not let them in the bulding, but it was really sweet.
data.value: Unfortunately, I could not let them in the bulding, but it was really sweet.

data.name: It was the first time someone thought I would be a star, it was also the last time that someone ever thought I would be a star.
data.value: It was the first time someone thought I would be a star, it was also the last time that someone ever thought I would be a star.

data.name: And now the best part: When everyone was on company holiday, I should move some computers.
data.value: And now the best part: When everyone was on company holiday, I should move some computers.

data.name: While doing that, I forgot to disconnect the power cable of one monitor.
data.value: While doing that, I forgot to disconnect the power cable of one monitor.

data.name: The power cable was still connected to the monitor and the power socket.
data.value: The power cable was still connected to the monitor and the power socket.

data.name: And now it starts: I tried to carry the monitor away, but the connection to the power socket was that strong that I stopped unvoluntarily and tilted forward.
data.value: And now it starts: I tried to carry the monitor away, but the connection to the power socket was that strong that I stopped unvoluntarily and tilted forward.

data.name: I was supposed to fall, but the monitor connected to the power socket kept me from falling.
data.value: I was supposed to fall, but the monitor connected to the power socket kept me from falling.

data.name: I stood in a ca. 30 degrees angle and did not know if I was allowed to move a bit.
data.value: I stood in a ca. 30 degrees angle and did not know if I was allowed to move a bit.

data.name: I was not holding the monitor anymore, the monitor was holding me now.
data.value: I was not holding the monitor anymore, the monitor was holding me now.

data.name: I stood there like that for several minutes and waited for help.
data.value: I stood there like that for several minutes and waited for help.

data.name: But since the everyone was on company holiday, I was alone.
data.value: But since the everyone was on company holiday, I was alone.

data.name: I decided then to move one foot forwards slowly.
data.value: I decided then to move one foot forwards slowly.

data.name: But that was too much for the power cable then.
data.value: But that was too much for the power cable then.

data.name: The power cable disconnected itself from the power socket and I fell with the monitor.
data.value: The power cable disconnected itself from the power socket and I fell with the monitor.

data.name: The monitor was damaged a bit, it was used in our helpdesk room later.
data.value: The monitor was damaged a bit, it was used in our helpdesk room later.

data.name: I can only imagine how that must have looked.
data.value: I can only imagine how that must have looked.

data.name: I am a big Brent Spiner, Kerry Shale, Hogan's Heroes, Granada Holmes, Frogwares' Sherlock Holmes, ERA and Enya fan.
data.value: I am a big Brent Spiner, Kerry Shale, Hogan's Heroes, Granada Holmes, Frogwares' Sherlock Holmes, ERA and Enya fan.

data.name: I am a fan of Hogan's Heros since
data.value: I am a fan of Hogan's Heros since

data.name: years meanwhile, since I was 21 years old.
data.value: years meanwhile, since I was 21 years old.

data.name: The actor Robert Clary from Hogan's Heroes caused me to have a deeper look into Jewish habits.
data.value: The actor Robert Clary from Hogan's Heroes caused me to have a deeper look into Jewish habits.

data.name: I saw a video series of him once which showed where he had visited the former concentration camp where he was imprisoned once.
data.value: I saw a video series of him once which showed where he had visited the former concentration camp where he was imprisoned once.

data.name: He started to cry when he was standing in one of the Holocaust trains again which was still parked there, it broke my heart.
data.value: He started to cry when he was standing in one of the Holocaust trains again which was still parked there, it broke my heart.

data.name: Too sad that the video series is not available on YouTube anymore, it had such an important message for the world.
data.value: Too sad that the video series is not available on YouTube anymore, it had such an important message for the world.

data.name: During my study we had a class called intercultural communication where I had visited an Evangelic Church, a Synagogue and a Mosque.
data.value: During my study we had a class called "intercultural communication" where I had visited an Evangelic Church, a Synagogue and a Mosque.

data.name: All of them were interesting and I also liked it when the Evangelic Church made jokes about the Catholic Church which my Catholic classmates did not find that funny.
data.value: All of them were interesting and I also liked it when the Evangelic Church made jokes about the Catholic Church which my Catholic classmates did not find that funny.

data.name: I even saw a Holy Torah directly in front of me.
data.value: I even saw a Holy Torah directly in front of me.

data.name: We were not allowed to touch the Holy Torah, we had to use a silver stick which had a small hand with a pointing finger at its tip.
data.value: We were not allowed to touch the Holy Torah, we had to use a silver stick which had a small hand with a pointing finger at its tip.

data.name: After that I had joined 3 Jewish prayers in the Chabad Synagogue in Berlin, you need to turn around during the prayer.
data.value: After that I had joined 3 Jewish prayers in the Chabad Synagogue in Berlin, you need to turn around during the prayer.

data.name: I had worked for the Centrum Judaicum / New Synagogue in Berlin for some months voluntarily and helped to restore the data of victims of the Holocaust.
data.value: I had worked for the Centrum Judaicum / New Synagogue in Berlin for some months voluntarily and helped to restore the data of victims of the Holocaust.

data.name: I have to admit that I had even played with the thought to become a member of the Jewish community, but I stopped with the idea when I learnt that it would not be that easy as joining the Evangelic Church where you can simply buy your membership.
data.value: I have to admit that I had even played with the thought to become a member of the Jewish community, but I stopped with the idea when I learnt that it would not be that easy as joining the Evangelic Church where you can simply buy your membership.

data.name: Later I came away from that idea when I witnessed some Facebook wars between religious groups.
data.value: Later I came away from that idea when I witnessed some Facebook wars between religious groups.

data.name: Since that I am happy that I am an atheist, a very proud atheist, but I still feel close to the Jewish community - it seems to be the one with the most sane people if you ask me, followed by people who are part of the Evangelic Church community.
data.value: Since that I am happy that I am an atheist, a very proud atheist, but I still feel close to the Jewish community - it seems to be the one with the most sane people if you ask me, followed by people who are part of the Evangelic Church community.

data.name: I learnt much later that Brent Spiner and Kerry Shale also have Jewish roots.
data.value: I learnt much later that Brent Spiner and Kerry Shale also have Jewish roots.

data.name: I only noticed it when they started to talk about it, when I was already a fan of them (otherwise you would not search for it).
data.value: I only noticed it when they started to talk about it, when I was already a fan of them (otherwise you would not search for it).

data.name: I find it fantastic that they are that open and I wish that everyone could be so open-minded.
data.value: I find it fantastic that they are that open and I wish that everyone could be so open-minded.

data.name: I had learnt some Yiddish words from Brent Spiner and now also the first Yiddish words from Kerry Shale.
data.value: I had learnt some Yiddish words from Brent Spiner and now also the first Yiddish words from Kerry Shale.

data.name: I did not know about the shtetl (Yiddish, from German: Städtle, English: small town) until Kerry Shale had mentioned it.
data.value: I did not know about the shtetl (Yiddish, from German: Städtle, English: small town) until Kerry Shale had mentioned it.

data.name: When googling about it, I found out that all shtetl were destroyed by German Nazis between 1939 and 1945.
data.value: When googling about it, I found out that all shtetl were destroyed by German Nazis between 1939 and 1945.

data.name: Well, it would surprise me if we Germans would have done something good in that context.
data.value: Well, it would surprise me if we Germans would have done something good in that context.

data.name: Kerry Shale said that his father saw himself as a very fiercely Canadian.
data.value: Kerry Shale said that his father saw himself as a very fiercely Canadian.

data.name: I can imagine that well, you only need to look at the Jewish History in Europe between 1800 and 1945, then you will know why.
data.value: I can imagine that well, you only need to look at the Jewish History in Europe between 1800 and 1945, then you will know why.

data.name: I found this video interesting about such shtetl he had mentioned:
data.value: I found this video interesting about such shtetl he had mentioned:

data.name: Shtetl-YouTube-Link
data.value: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JUzXk5poX78

data.name: What Life in the Shtetl Was Like
data.value: What Life in the Shtetl Was Like

data.name: It is also interesting that Kerry Shale and Brent Spiner have something in common when it is about the immigration to North America, see:
data.value: It is also interesting that Kerry Shale and Brent Spiner have something in common when it is about the immigration to North America, see:

data.name: Brent Spiner Biography
data.value: Brent Spiner Biography

data.name: A small excursion (you will learn that history at the Jewish Museum in Berlin as well):
data.value: A small excursion (you will learn that history at the Jewish Museum in Berlin as well):

data.name: The discrimination against the Jewish people has a very long history, it started already when Moses saw G-d the first time, since the Ten Commandments.
data.value: The discrimination against the Jewish people has a very long history, it started already when Moses saw G-d the first time, since the Ten Commandments.

data.name: In the Middle Ages, the Jewish people had to wear a yellow ring which already reminds the yellow star they had to wear in Nazi Germany.
data.value: In the Middle Ages, the Jewish people had to wear a yellow ring which already reminds the yellow star they had to wear in Nazi Germany.

data.name: Jewish people were made responsible for the Black Death.
data.value: Jewish people were made responsible for the Black Death.

data.name: Jewish people were only allowed to do specific jobs for many centuries.
data.value: Jewish people were only allowed to do specific jobs for many centuries.

data.name: Jewish people were not even allowed to enter specific cities or were put in so-called ghettos later.
data.value: Jewish people were not even allowed to enter specific cities or were put in so-called ghettos later.

data.name: Then there were also pogroms where Jewish people got killed.
data.value: Then there were also pogroms where Jewish people got killed.

data.name: Around 1800, the discrimination against the Jewish people became that bad that many of the Jewish people even converted to the Christian religion and even changed their whole identity.
data.value: Around 1800, the discrimination against the Jewish people became that bad that many of the Jewish people even converted to the Christian religion and even changed their whole identity.

data.name: A very famous example is Heinrich Heine (German poet).
data.value: A very famous example is Heinrich Heine (German poet).

data.name: But it did not help, the discrimination against the Jewish people increased, they were not allowed to use the same locations like e.g. all other Germans did.
data.value: But it did not help, the discrimination against the Jewish people increased, they were not allowed to use the same locations like e.g. all other Germans did.

data.name: It became that bad with time that many Jewish people started to leave Europe, they immigrated to North America in the main.
data.value: It became that bad with time that many Jewish people started to leave Europe, they immigrated to North America in the main.

data.name: The discrimination against the Jewish people found its sad height in the Holocaust, the genocide of the European Jewish people.
data.value: The discrimination against the Jewish people found its sad height in the Holocaust, the genocide of the European Jewish people.

data.name: You wonder why there are so many Jewish people in financial business and film business?
data.value: You wonder why there are so many Jewish people in financial business and film business?

data.name: That is the result of the discrimination against the Jewish people, because they were not allowed to have another job for centuries.
data.value: That is the result of the discrimination against the Jewish people, because they were not allowed to have another job for centuries.

data.name: And blaming them for working in those two businesses now is -to be honest- the biggest bullshit ever!
data.value: And blaming them for working in those two businesses now is -to be honest- the biggest bullshit ever!

data.name: Right, some are very successful in that business, and we should be happy about it.
data.value: Right, some are very successful in that business, and we should be happy about it.

data.name: Everyone is free to work in the financial business or film business.
data.value: Everyone is free to work in the financial business or film business.

data.name: There is no need to be jealous.
data.value: There is no need to be jealous.

data.name: I think that more than 3000 years of the persecution should be enough, it needs to stop now.
data.value: I think that more than 3000 years of the persecution should be enough, it needs to stop now.

data.name: The Holocaust left very deep scars which are still visible today.
data.value: The Holocaust left very deep scars which are still visible today.

data.name: The Holocaust cannot be undone, and there is no excuse for it, and we must do everything that such a history does not repeat.
data.value: The Holocaust cannot be undone, and there is no excuse for it, and we must do everything that such a history does not repeat.

data.name: By the way, it takes an enormous effort to create one Holy Torah, every Holy Torah is handcrafted.
data.value: By the way, it takes an enormous effort to create one Holy Torah, every Holy Torah is handcrafted.

data.name: When Nazis had destroyed the Synagogues, the Torahs inside those Synagogues were desecrated.
data.value: When Nazis had destroyed the Synagogues, the Torahs inside those Synagogues were desecrated.

data.name: Each of those Torahs was buried in an own grave.
data.value: Each of those Torahs was buried in an own grave.

data.name: Even today, every Torah which has completed its service is buried in an own grave.
data.value: Even today, every Torah which has completed its service is buried in an own grave.

data.name: This video had a big impact on me:
data.value: This video had a big impact on me:

data.name: Children in the Warsaw Ghetto
data.value: Children in the Warsaw Ghetto

data.name: Here is another video from
data.value: Here is another video from

data.name: So, please, if you deal with me...
data.value: So, please, if you deal with me...

data.name: Please know that I do get a real bad skin rush if I see any anti-Jewish (aka antisemitic) comments somewhere.
data.value: Please know that I do get a real bad skin rush if I see any anti-Jewish (aka antisemitic) comments somewhere.

data.name: And if you do not want to be stoned by me, please stay away from me with anti-Jewish comments or jokes, hate speech, racism and homophobia.
data.value: And if you do not want to be stoned by me, please stay away from me with anti-Jewish comments or jokes, hate speech, racism and homophobia.

data.name: If a Jewish person is doing jokes about Jewish things, it will be another thing - Jewish people are the only ones who are allowed to do that.
data.value: If a Jewish person is doing jokes about Jewish things, it will be another thing - Jewish people are the only ones who are allowed to do that.

data.value: Disclaimer: This website is a non-profit project, it means that no profit will ever be made with this website, an exception may be external websites linked from this website.

data.name: On this website, I provide a more in-depth overview regarding to Kerry Shale's private life because it occurs to me that it does get too little credit elsewhere.
data.value: On this website, I provide a more in-depth overview regarding to Kerry Shale's private life because it occurs to me that it does get too little credit elsewhere.

data.name: In opposite to that, his work is described in every detail on other websites.
data.value: In opposite to that, his work is described in every detail on other websites.
